item.title: J On The Beach 2017 â€” Jepsen Workshop
item.description: Network's Laggy Store it maybe Photos shamelessly stolen from Kyle Kinsburry's website The first book I’ve read about distributed systems was Distributed Systems: Principles and Paradigms by Andrew S. Tanenbaum and Maarten van Steen. I was reading at the library on my last year of study and I remember being confused very often, and to be honest I didn’t even finish it…
